Uses of TransportException in org.codeshark.guicebox.failover
 

Methods in org.codeshark.guicebox.failover that throw TransportException
 Heartbeat Transport.receive(Heartbeat ownHeartbeat, int timeout)
          Blocks for the specified number of milliseconds, or until a valid Heartbeat is received from another node in the same cluster.
 void Transport.send(Heartbeat hb)
          Broadcasts the specified heartbeat to other nodes in the cluster.
